Package org.skistation.services

Class LiftTicketService

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.services.LiftTicketService
@Service public class LiftTicketService extends Object
Represents a lift ticket service class. It provides methods to perform operations on the lift ticket table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    LiftTicketService(LiftTicketRepository liftTicketRepository, LiftService liftService, TicketService ticketService)
    Constructs a new lift ticket service with the specified lift ticket repository, lift service, and ticket service.

      Constructs a new lift ticket service with the specified lift ticket repository, lift service, and ticket service.
      Parameters:
      liftTicketRepository - the lift ticket repository to perform operations on the lift ticket table in the database
      liftService - the lift service to perform operations on the lift table in the database
      ticketService - the ticket service to perform operations on the ticket table in the database
